definition: to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
to say/to tell/to announce/to report/to denounce/to file a lawsuit/to sue

sentences.english: Please tell Mr. Luman that Mr. Fisher will not be able to keep the appointment.
sentences.chinese: 請轉告魯曼先生，費希爾先生不能如期赴約。

sentences.english: She stays and waits for Ross to return so she can tell him.
sentences.chinese: 她留下來等待羅斯返家，並打算親口轉告他。

sentences.english: I'll let him know, Mn. Brown.
sentences.chinese: 我會轉告他的，布朗先生。

sentences.english: Would you mind telling me? And then I tell her.
sentences.chinese: 能告訴我嗎？然後我轉告她。

sentences.english: ok. i'll tell him that you called.
sentences.chinese: 好的，我轉告他您來德律風了。

sentences.english: Could you tell him Seon called?
sentences.chinese: 請轉告他申來過電話可以嗎？

sentences.english: He panted excitedly giving us the news as he had just heard it.
sentences.chinese: 他氣喘吁吁，興奮地將他剛剛聽到的消息轉告給我們。

sentences.english: Transmit following to Mitsubishi firm chemical Dept case settled amicably already.
sentences.chinese: 請轉告三井公司化學部，此事已獲圓滿解決。

sentences.english: Would you let him know, I called. this is Hance.
sentences.chinese: 請轉告他我打過電話給他了，我是Hance。

sentences.english: So to her mother, Tommy said.
sentences.chinese: 於是請她母親轉告，湯米說。

sentences.english: He passed on the good news to his friends.
sentences.chinese: 他把這個好消息轉告了他的朋友。

sentences.english: He wanted me to convey his apology to Mr. Wang.
sentences.chinese: 讓讓我向王經理轉告他的歉意。

sentences.english: Would you please send my words to the girl sitting besides you?
sentences.chinese: 請把這兩句話轉告給你旁邊的那個女孩子好嗎？

sentences.english: Please tell him that Lu Ming tried to contact him.
sentences.chinese: 請你轉告他陸明正設法跟他聯繫。

sentences.english: Could you please tell Mr. Liu (Manager Liu) …
